card.name: Afflicted Deserter
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Afflicted Deserter.

attr.value: Whenever this creature transforms into Werewolf Ransacker, you may destroy target artifact. If that artifact is put into a graveyard this way, Werewolf Ransacker deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Werewolf Ransacker.

card.name: Alpha Brawl
card.text: Target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to each other creature that player controls, then each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to that creature.

card.name: Altar of the Lost
card.text: Altar of the Lost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast spells with flashback from a graveyard.

card.name: Archangel's Light
card.text: You gain 2 life for each card in your graveyard, then shuffle your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Artful Dodge
card.text: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Flashback {U}

card.name: Avacyn's Collar
Bar the Door
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Beguiler of Wills
card.text: {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Black Cat
card.text: When Black Cat dies, target opponent discards a card at random.

card.name: Blood Feud
card.text: Target creature fights another target creature.

card.name: Bone to Ash
card.text: Counter target creature spell. Draw a card.

card.name: Break of Day
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Fateful hour - If you have 5 or less life, those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Briarpack Alpha
card.text: Flash When Briarpack Alpha enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Burden of Guilt
card.text: Enchant creature {1}: Tap enchanted creature.

card.name: Burning Oil
card.text: Burning Oil deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Flashback {3}{W}

card.name: Call to the Kindred
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top five cards of your library. If you do, you may put a creature card that shares a creature type with enchanted creature from among them onto the battlefield, then you put the rest of those cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Chalice of Life
card.text: {T}: You gain 1 life. Then if you have at least 10 life more than your starting life total, transform Chalice of Life.

card.name: Chant of the Skifsang
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -13/-0.

card.name: Chill of Foreboding
card.text: Each player puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Flashback {7}{U}

card.name: Chosen of Markov
card.text: {T}, Tap an untapped Vampire you control: Transform Chosen of Markov.

card.name: Clinging Mists
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Fateful hour - If you have 5 or less life, tap all attacking creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

card.name: Counterlash
card.text: Counter target spell. You may cast a nonland card in your hand that shares a card type with that spell without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Crushing Vines
card.text: Choose one - Destroy target creature with flying; or destroy target artifact.

card.name: Curse of Bloodletting
card.text: Enchant player If a source would deal damage to enchanted player, it deals double that damage to that player instead.

card.name: Curse of Echoes
card.text: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player casts an instant or sorcery spell, each other player may copy that spell and may choose new targets for the copy he or she controls.

card.name: Curse of Exhaustion
card.text: Enchant player Enchanted player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

card.name: Curse of Misfortunes
card.text: Enchant player At the beginning of your upkeep, you may search your library for a Curse card that doesn't have the same name as a Curse attached to enchanted player, put it onto the battlefield attached to that player, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Curse of Thirst
card.text: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, Curse of Thirst deals damage to that player equal to the number of Curses attached to him or her.

card.name: Dawntreader Elk
card.text: {G}, Sacrifice Dawntreader Elk: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Deadly Allure
card.text: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able. Flashback {G}

card.name: Death's Caress
card.text: Destroy target creature. If that creature was a Human, you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Deranged Outcast
card.text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice a Human: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

card.name: Diregraf Captain
card.text: Deathtouch Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever another Zombie you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Divination
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Drogskol Captain
card.text: Flying Other Spirit creatures you control get +1/+1 and have hexproof.

card.name: Drogskol Reaver
card.text: Flying, double strike, lifelink Whenever you gain life, draw a card.

card.name: Dungeon Geists
card.text: Flying When Dungeon Geists enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Dungeon Geists.

card.name: Elbrus, the Binding Blade

attr.value: Flying, intimidate, trample Whenever a player loses the game, put thirteen +1/+1 counters on Withengar Unbound.

card.name: Elgaud Inquisitor
card.text: Lifelink When Elgaud Inquisitor dies, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Erdwal Ripper
card.text: Haste Whenever Erdwal Ripper deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Executioner's Hood
card.text: Equipped creature has intimidate. Equip {2}

card.name: Faithless Looting
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R}

card.name: Faith's Shield
card.text: Target permanent you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Fateful hour - If you have 5 or less life, instead you and each permanent you control gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Falkenrath Aristocrat
card.text: Flying, haste Sacrifice a creature: Falkenrath Aristocrat gains indestructible until end of turn. If the sacrificed creature was a Human, put a +1/+1 counter on Falkenrath Aristocrat.

card.name: Falkenrath Torturer
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Falkenrath Torturer gains flying until end of turn. If the sacrificed creature was a Human, put a +1/+1 counter on Falkenrath Torturer.

card.name: Farbog Boneflinger
card.text: When Farbog Boneflinger enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Favor of the Woods
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature blocks, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Feed the Pack
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a nontoken creature. If you do, put X 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the sacrificed creature's toughness.

card.name: Fiend of the Shadows
card.text: Flying Whenever Fiend of the Shadows deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles a card from his or her hand. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled. Sacrifice a Human: Regenerate Fiend of the Shadows.

card.name: Fires of Undeath
card.text: Fires of Undeath deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Flashback {5}{B}

card.name: Flayer of the Hatebound
card.text: Undying Whenever Flayer of the Hatebound or another creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

card.name: Fling
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Fling, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.

card.name: Forge Devil
card.text: When Forge Devil enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to you.

card.name: Gather the Townsfolk
card.text: Put two 1/1 white Human creature tokens onto the battlefield. Fateful hour - If you have 5 or less life, put five of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.

card.name: Gavony Ironwright
card.text: Fateful hour - As long as you have 5 or less life, other creatures you control get +1/+4.

card.name: Geralf's Messenger
card.text: Geralf's Messenger enters the battlefield tapped. When Geralf's Messenger enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life. Undying

card.name: Geralf's Mindcrusher
card.text: When Geralf's Mindcrusher enters the battlefield, target player puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Undying

card.name: Ghoultree
card.text: Ghoultree costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.

card.name: Grafdigger's Cage
card.text: Creature cards can't enter the battlefield from graveyards or libraries. Players can't cast cards in graveyards or libraries.

card.name: Gravecrawler
card.text: Gravecrawler can't block. You may cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard as long as you control a Zombie.

card.name: Gravepurge
card.text: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card.

card.name: Gravetiller Wurm
card.text: Trample Morbid - Gravetiller Wurm enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Grim Backwoods
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

card.name: Grim Flowering
card.text: Draw a card for each creature card in your graveyard.

card.name: Griptide
card.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Gruesome Discovery
card.text: Target player discards two cards. Morbid - If a creature died this turn, instead that player reveals his or her hand, you choose two cards from it, then that player discards those cards.

card.name: Harrowing Journey
card.text: Target player draws three cards and loses 3 life.

card.name: Haunted Fengraf
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Haunted Fengraf: Return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Havengul Lich
card.text: {1}: You may cast target creature card in a graveyard this turn. When you cast that card this turn, Havengul Lich gains all activated abilities of that card until end of turn.

card.name: Havengul Runebinder
card.text: {2}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Zombie creature you control.

card.name: Headless Skaab
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Headless Skaab, exile a creature card from your graveyard. Headless Skaab enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Heavy Mattock
Heckling Fiends
card.text: {2}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

card.name: Hellrider
card.text: Haste Whenever a creature you control attacks, Hellrider deals 1 damage to defending player.

card.name: Helvault
card.text: {1}, {T}: Exile target creature you control. {7}, {T}: Exile target creature you don't control. When Helvault is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.

card.name: Hinterland Hermit
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Hinterland Hermit.

attr.value: Hinterland Scourge must be blocked if able. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Hinterland Scourge.

card.name: Hollowhenge Spirit
card.text: Flash Flying When Hollowhenge Spirit enters the battlefield, remove target attacking or blocking creature from combat.

card.name: Hunger of the Howlpack
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Morbid - Put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Huntmaster of the Fells
card.text: Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or transforms into Huntmaster of the Fells, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield and you gain 2 life. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Huntmaster of the Fells.

attr.value: Trample Whenever this creature transforms into Ravager of the Fells, it deals 2 damage to target opponent and 2 damage to up to one target creature that player controls. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ravager of the Fells.

card.name: Immerwolf
card.text: Intimidate Each other creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf gets +1/+1. Non-Human Werewolves you control can't transform.

card.name: Increasing Ambition
card.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. If Increasing Ambition was cast from a graveyard, instead search your library for two cards and put those cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Flashback {7}{B}

card.name: Increasing Confusion
card.text: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If Increasing Confusion was cast from a graveyard, that player puts twice that many cards into his or her graveyard instead. Flashback {X}{U}

card.name: Increasing Devotion
card.text: Put five 1/1 white Human creature tokens onto the battlefield. If Increasing Devotion was cast from a graveyard, put ten of those tokens onto the battlefield instead. Flashback {7}{W}{W}

card.name: Increasing Savagery
card.text: Put five +1/+1 counters on target creature. If Increasing Savagery was cast from a graveyard, put ten +1/+1 counters on that creature instead. Flashback {5}{G}{G}

card.name: Increasing Vengeance
card.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If Increasing Vengeance was cast from a graveyard, copy that spell twice instead. You may choose new targets for the copies. Flashback {3}{R}{R}

card.name: Jar of Eyeballs
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, put two eyeball counters on Jar of Eyeballs. {3}, {T}, Remove all eyeball counters from Jar of Eyeballs: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of eyeball counters removed this way. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Lambholt Elder
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Lambholt Elder.

attr.value: Whenever Silverpelt Werewolf deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Silverpelt Werewolf.

card.name: Lingering Souls
card.text: Put two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield. Flashback {1}{B}

card.name: Lost in the Woods
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Forest card, remove that creature from combat. Then put the revealed card on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Loyal Cathar
card.text: Vigilance When Loyal Cathar dies, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Markov Blademaster
card.text: Double strike Whenever Markov Blademaster deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Markov Warlord
card.text: Haste When Markov Warlord enters the battlefield, up to two target creatures can't block this turn.

card.name: Midnight Guard
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Midnight Guard.

card.name: Mikaeus, the Unhallowed
card.text: Intimidate Whenever a Human deals damage to you, destroy it. Other non-Human creatures you control get +1/+1 and have undying.

card.name: Mondronen Shaman
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Mondronen Shaman.

attr.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Tovolar's Magehunter deals 2 damage to that player. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Tovolar's Magehunter.

card.name: Predator Ooze
card.text: Indestructible Whenever Predator Ooze attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature dealt damage by Predator Ooze this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Predator Ooze.

card.name: Pyreheart Wolf
card.text: Whenever Pyreheart Wolf attacks, each creature you control can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures. Undying

card.name: Ravenous Demon
card.text: Sacrifice a Human: Transform Ravenous Demon. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.text: As an additional cost to cast Relentless Skaabs, exile a creature card from your graveyard. Undying

card.name: Scorch the Fields

card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Scorned Villager.

card.name: Screeching Skaab
card.text: When Screeching Skaab enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Secrets of the Dead
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, draw a card.

Return each card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control.

card.text: Warden of the Wall enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. As long as it's not your turn, Warden of the Wall is a 2/3 Gargoyle artifact creature with flying.

card.text: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn. Flashback {3}{R}
